name: those pixel rooms of mine
description:
After forgetting even your own name the only thing you remember are fractured images of your own flat - of the rooms you called your home once. Talking about those rooms to an interested listener could bring some of your precious memories back. Or maybe you will lose even more...

So basically this is the same game as "those rooms of mine" but with a pixel filter. Originally this filter was planed as an option in the settings of "those rooms of mine" but I had to change some effects and textures so I decided to post it as a new game.

"those pixel rooms of mine" is a classic indie horror game with some puzzles and two different endings. A playthrough is about 45 - 60 minutes and the game does not provide any save mechanics or checkpoints. Maybe to not destroy the immersion or maybe because I was simply to lazy to implement those ;). It is somewhat a sequel to "maybe I can wake up by force" however you don't have to play that first.

Have fun and please tell me what you think. If you find any bugs or issues I will fix them as fast as possible.
